009package Ch16_ColorEdges;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
015import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
016import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
017import imagingbook.common.edges.EdgeDetector;
018import imagingbook.common.edges.MonochromaticEdgeDetector;
019import imagingbook.common.edges.MonochromaticEdgeDetector.Parameters;
020import imagingbook.core.FileUtils;
021
022/**
023 * This is a simple color edge detector based on monochromatic techniques.
024 * May be applied to color images only.
025 * 
026 * @author WB
027 * @version 2013/05/30
028 * @version 2022/09/11 removed color norm option (not available for this detector)
029 */
030public class Color_Edges_Mono implements PlugInFilter {
031        
032        static boolean showEdgeMagnitude = true;
033        static boolean showEdgeOrientation = false;
034        
035        ImagePlus imp = null;
036
037    public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
038        this.imp = imp;
039        return DOES_RGB + NO_CHANGES;
040    }
041
042    public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
043        String title = imp.getTitle();
044        title = FileUtils.stripFileExtension(title);
045        Parameters params = new Parameters();
046        
047        if (!setParameters(params)) 
048                return;
049        
050        EdgeDetector ced = new MonochromaticEdgeDetector((ColorProcessor) ip, params);
051                
052        if (showEdgeMagnitude) {
053                FloatProcessor edgeMagnitude = ced.getEdgeMagnitude();
054                (new ImagePlus("Edge Magnitude (Mono)", edgeMagnitude)).show();
055        }
056                
057                if (showEdgeOrientation) {
058                        FloatProcessor edgeOrientation = ced.getEdgeOrientation();
059                        (new ImagePlus("Edge Orientation (Mono)", edgeOrientation)).show();
060                }
061    }
062    
063    boolean setParameters(Parameters params) {
064                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog("Monochromatic Color Edges");
065                gd.addCheckbox("Show edge magnitude", showEdgeMagnitude);
066                gd.addCheckbox("Show edge orientation", showEdgeOrientation);
067                
068                gd.showDialog();
069                if(gd.wasCanceled()) 
070                        return false;
071                
072                showEdgeMagnitude = gd.getNextBoolean();
073                showEdgeOrientation =  gd.getNextBoolean();
074                return true;
075    }
076      
077}
078
